column3: Add-a-Verb Chassis kit. Chassis, fiber board
Cable, shielded, 10", phono plug in each end
Bolt, machine, #4-40x5/16, with nut and star washer
RCA Jack, black diamond fiber base
Chassis mount phone jack, non shorting
Nut, #8-32 w/integral washer (for mounting reverb pan, double nut to secure)
